title: Structural Analysis of Vector Autoregressive Models. (arXiv:2312.06402v5 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
abstract: This set of lecture notes discuss key concepts for the Structural Analysis of Vector Autoregressive models for the teaching of a course on Applied Macroeconometrics with Advanced Topics.

translated_title: 矢量自回归模型的结构分析
translated_abstract: 这份讲义介绍了应用宏观经济计量学高级课程中矢量自回归模型的结构分析的关键概念。
